message.content:
cs.IT, cs.NI, cs.GT, cs.MM, cs.SY. 

The paper deals with the problem of relay selection in wireless systems, which is a common topic in the Information Theory (cs.IT) and Networking and Internet Architecture (cs.NI) sub-categories. The use of contract theory to design incentive-compatible contracts for relays suggests a game-theoretic approach, which is also relevant to the Game Theory (cs.GT) sub-category. The paper also proposes a heuristic relay selection scheme, which involves optimization and decision-making, making it relevant to the Multimedia (cs.MM) and Systems and Control (cs.SY) sub-categories.
